&8▪ &7XP Boost: &b50%

&8▪ &7Price: &b17.99€

store.item.ranks.epic.description:

&8▪ &7Party limit: &b30

&8▪ &7XP Boost: &b100%

game.pearlcontrol.description:
Control the area or
push all your opponents
to win the game.
Use your pearls to
catch up and not die.
game.rushtheflag.description:
Capture the opponent's flag and
bring it back to your base.
Use your Power to
surprise your opponents
and defeat them more easily.
Play in single, double
or squad mode for more fun!
game.therunner.description:
Run to the center
of the map without making mistakes.
Arrive first to
gain an advantage and beat
your opponents! Choose a challenge
to earn better rewards
and become the best!
game.bridger.description:
Practice bridge
and achieve the best time.
Win the medals to
move up in the ranking
and earn rewards!
game.bedwars.description:
Protect your bed and
destroy the opponent's beds.
Kill all the players
to win the game.
Play in single, double, 
trio or squad mode for more fun!
game.lasergame.description:
Shoot your opponents
to gain a maximum of
points. Collect the bonuses
dispersed on the map to
obtain useful abilities.
Play as a team to win
the game more easily.
